mention.text: I when my wife is sleeping
I in my north room dance
a flame-white disc in silken mists above shining trees , -- if I in my north room dance naked , grotesquely before my mirror waving my shirt round my head and singing softly to myself
flanks , buttocks against the yellow drawn shades ,
flanks , buttocks against the yellow drawn shades
buttocks against the yellow drawn shades
